price: Maka apakah mereka mencari agama yang lain dari agama Allah, padahal kepada-Nya-lah menyerahkan diri segala apa yang di langit dan di bumi, baik dengan suka maupun terpaksa dan hanya kepada Allah-lah mereka dikembalikan.
arabic: أَفَغَيۡرَ دِينِ ٱللَّهِ يَبۡغُونَ وَلَهُۥٓ أَسۡلَمَ مَن فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ طَوۡعٗا وَكَرۡهٗا وَإِلَيۡهِ يُرۡجَعُونَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: afaghayra dīni al-lahi yabghūna walahu aslama man fī al-samāwāti wal-arḍi ṭawʿan wakarhan wa-ilayhi yur'jaʿūna
